channel.title: 附录 on Kubernetes 实践指南
channel.description: Recent content in 附录 on Kubernetes 实践指南

item.title: 安装 kubectl
item.description: 二进制安装 指定K8S版本与节点cpu架构: VERSION="v1.16.1" ARCH="amd64" 下载安装: wget -q --show-progress --https-only --timestamping \ https://storage.googleapis.com/kubernetes-release/release/${VERSION}/bin/linux/${ARCH}/kubectl chmod +x kubectl mv kubectl /usr/local/bin/
